name: Stella's Spikey Dream
description:
A relaxing casual game about a little girl, her big stick and their adventure to collect strange cards in a cave.

This is a 2D action platformer game. The player needs to venture through a cave filled with dangerous spikes, and will be navigating through the levels to reach a mysterious enemy at the end. The core gameplay is platforming, the player will be utilising their ability to double jump in order to jump to and from multiple platforms. Timing is important as one wrong move and result in the player falling to their death. Some of the environment can be destroyed by attacking them with the stick carried by the player, maybe there will be interesting finds.
